content: & beg corner double_crochet in 2sts staying behind your work tc in skipped st of round 9 double_crochet in next double_crochet 19x double_crochet in next st corner in next space 4x minus last corner & join fasten_off & weave in your ends 180dc you might need to block your square it does tend to wave but my testers pretty much agreed that blocking helps but that putting this square with an afghan will also help it to straighten out personal use only no reproductions selling or copying allowed pattern available for download on ravelry dragonflymomof2 http //www ravelry com/designers/aurora­suominen dragonflymomof2 designs© support email bluedragonflymom@gmail com october love © page2
